document.full_text: a young oklahoma city team take on the wily texas sharp-shooters of dallas in a western showdown between the mavericks and thunder starting tuesday with the survivor heading on to the nba finals.
document.title: mavericks face thunder in nba's western finals showdown
lines_and_colors: a young oklahoma city team take on the wily texas sharp-shooters of dallas in a western showdown between the mavericks and thunder starting tuesday with the survivor heading on to the nba finals.
